faqs.question: What platforms can you stream to?
faqs.answer: We can stream to virtually any platform including YouTube, Vimeo, LinkedIn Live, Facebook, Twitch, and custom RTMP destinations. We also support multi-platform simultaneous streaming and can integrate with your existing video conferencing tools.

faqs.question: How do you ensure stream reliability?
faqs.answer: We use redundant systems including backup encoders, multiple internet connections, and failover protocols to ensure 99.9% uptime. Our team monitors all technical aspects in real-time and can switch to backup systems instantly if needed.

faqs.question: Can you add graphics and branding to live streams?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide full graphics packages including lower thirds, logos, animated transitions, live social media feeds, and real-time data displays. All graphics are customized to match your brand guidelines.

brandStorytelling.intro: Great brands have great stories. We help you discover and share yours through compelling documentary-style content, brand films, and narrative videos that create genuine emotional connections with your audience.

brandStorytelling.why1: Documentary filmmaking expertise for authentic narratives
brandStorytelling.why2: Deep discovery process to uncover your unique story
brandStorytelling.why3: Emotional storytelling that drives audience action
brandStorytelling.why4: Content optimized for multiple platforms and formats
brandStorytelling.ctaDescription: Every brand has a story worth telling. Let's discover yours and share it with the world.

faqs.question: What is brand storytelling video?
faqs.answer: Brand storytelling is the art of using video to communicate your brand's purpose, values, and impact through compelling narratives. Unlike traditional advertising, brand stories focus on emotional connection and authenticity, showing audiences why your brand matters rather than just what you sell.

faqs.question: How do you discover our brand's story?
faqs.answer: We begin with a deep discovery process including stakeholder interviews, brand audits, and audience research. We explore your company's history, mission, culture, and the real impact you have on customers and communities. This research forms the foundation of an authentic narrative that resonates.

faqs.question: What makes a good brand film?
faqs.answer: The best brand films connect emotionally, tell authentic stories, and show rather than tell. They feature real people and genuine moments, have strong visual storytelling, and leave viewers with a clear understanding of what makes your brand unique. We focus on creating content that audiences actually want to watch and share.

faqs.question: How long should a brand storytelling video be?
faqs.answer: Length depends on platform and purpose. Hero brand films are typically 2-5 minutes for maximum emotional impact. We also create shorter cuts (30 seconds to 2 minutes) for social media and advertising. Many clients commission a full brand film alongside a suite of shorter pieces for different channels.

remoteProduction.ctaDescription: Need to produce content in multiple locations? Our remote production capabilities make it seamless.

faqs.question: How does remote video production work?
faqs.answer: Our connected film kits stream low-latency video to your location, allowing you to see exactly what the camera sees in real-time. You can communicate with the on-site crew, review takes, and make creative decisions just as if you were on set—all while staying at your office or home.

faqs.question: What locations do you cover for remote production?
faqs.answer: With offices in Paris, London, and Los Angeles, we have crews and equipment across Europe and North America. We also have vetted crew networks in major cities worldwide and can coordinate productions virtually anywhere you need content created.

faqs.question: Is the quality the same as being on set?
faqs.answer: Yes. Our remote kits use professional cinema cameras and our crews are experienced professionals. The only difference is how you supervise the shoot. Many clients find remote production actually improves efficiency since multiple stakeholders can view the feed from different locations simultaneously.

faqs.question: How much can I save with remote production?
faqs.answer: Remote production typically saves 30-50% compared to traveling a full production team to location. You eliminate travel costs, accommodation, and per diems while still maintaining full creative control. For multi-location shoots, the savings multiply significantly.

faqs.question: How much does a music video cost?
faqs.answer: Music video budgets vary widely based on concept complexity, locations, cast, and production scale. We work with budgets from $5,000 for simple performance videos to $100,000+ for high-concept narrative productions. We'll help you maximize production value within your budget.

faqs.question: How involved can I be in the creative process?
faqs.answer: As involved as you want to be. Some artists come with fully developed concepts, while others prefer to collaborate closely with our creative team. We typically start with your music and vision, then develop treatments together, refining until the concept perfectly matches your artistic direction.

faqs.question: How long does music video production take?
faqs.answer: Timeline depends on concept complexity. Simple performance videos can be completed in 2-3 weeks from shoot to delivery. Narrative videos with locations, cast, and VFX typically take 4-8 weeks. We can accommodate rush timelines for release deadlines when needed.

faqs.question: Do you work with independent artists or only labels?
faqs.answer: We work with everyone—major labels, independent labels, and self-releasing artists. Our flexible approach means we can scale production to match any budget while maintaining high creative and technical standards. Every artist deserves a great music video.
